alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 15 at 3:37AM MST until February 16 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER STORM TO BRING HEAVY SNOW TO PORTIONS OF THE MOUNTAINS AND PLAINS... .A winter storm will bring snow, heavy at times to most areas roughly along and south of I-70 today. The heaviest snow is expected in the mountains surrounding Park County, the southern foothills, the Palmer Divide (including I-25 between Denver and Colorado Springs), and possibly portions of I-70 through the plains. Snow will be heaviest this morning, with lighter snow lingering much of this afternoon and evening. In addition, gusty winds will lead to localized blowing snow concerns especially across the plains and Lincoln county. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow ongoing. Additional snow accumulations between 5 and 8 inches. * WHERE...Byers. * WHEN...Until Midnight MST tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org.

area.areaDesc: Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties
